form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa, FORM 1-130

full_text: U.S. Department of Justice Screened by NARA, 7/27/2023 OMB No. 1115-0054 Immigration and Naturalization Service Approval expires 4-86 PETITION TO CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE Fee Stamp FOR ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA I-130 130 35.00 (PLEASE NO's OU ARE THE PETITIONER AND YOUR RELATIVE IS THE BENEFICIARY) EMPL 22 08/05/86 15:17 TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: 08-05-86 REMARKS The petition was filed on The petition is approved for status under hos PERSONAL INTERVIEW CONDUCTED section: U.S. APPROVED INS.
